Description: Come up with initial milestones for getting started
Code a C-Lexer with basic functionality: identify most of the trivial tokens
Code a C-Parser linking Bison and Flex code and that has basic fucntionality: parse trivial expressions/statements
The C-Parser must identify and group basic tokens that are C-legal and build an AST
Improve on the C-Lexer with intermediate functionality
Improve on the C-Parser with intermediate fucntionality
Able to group intermediate tokens that are C-legal and build an AST
Refine and finalise the C-Lexer with advance functionality
Refine and finalise the C-Parser with advance fucntionality
Create AST for translating C-to-Python using completed lexer and parser
Create basic implementation of an Abstract Syntax Tree to MIPS ISA
Improve on the CodeGen with intermediate functionality
Build bashscript for basic test cases
